message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product that I think would be perfect for you. It's worth at least $8,000 to me, but I'm willing to start with an offer of $10,000. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
Bob, I understand you're interested in the product and I appreciate your offer.  I'm willing to come down a bit, but $9,500 is the lowest I can go at this point. Let's see if we can close the deal.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $9,500 is still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $9,200?
